title: Making a Ranked Team!
body:
Hey guys, I want to make a ranked team for the New Year. 
I'd like to have all 5 players, by January 1st, so we can have some time to play together, in ranked and in normals so we can familiarize our play styles. I know im only bronze, but when you see me play, you'll think other wise.

about me: i was a jungle main, but i prefer to go mid now. I can play every role quite well. main mids are leblanc, kat, ekko, veigar, ahri and vlad.
i work 3-4 days a week 9 hours per day so i am usually on during the night time. 

Post here if you're interested!

replies.body: at least he isnt diamond and plays like bronze
hows that christian blood smell going?

IGN: PROJECT WUKONG
Rank: Silver 2
GMT +10

Top Champs: Wukong, Maokai, Rumble, Shen (Willing to learn more if needed)
Support Champs: Thresh, Braum, Leona, Blitz
i would love to be part of the team!!!

Hello i can play support,mid and top 
I am interested.
Bro it seems you play on the Europe west server.
I hate to break it to you but you seem to play on the EUW server xD

I'm down B3 supp/ adc main, am willing to play any champs you think will fit the team comp. (Cannot play draven in adc btw). I am not overly mechanically skilled but I am a very team oriented player (lots of roams if possible, and good at communicating. I will put in the time and effort to know every little thing about the champs you want me to play.

hi man id love to join your team
i am only bronz 3 
play either support, jg or top (i can fill any lane)
play like 2 hours on week days and like between 3 and 6 on weekends
i can skype if wanted to
main = kat, ezreal, lee, poppy, fiora, janna, thresh, kalista

Hi ill join if u want me too i mean im currently gold 1 I dont know if thats ok or not and i main top but I can play mid and adc.  I can play wukong, darius, jax, gnar, renek and aatrox. I can play in mid Talon, syndra, viktor, fizz, brand, ekko, katarina, kassadin and a bit of ahri.  As for adc i can play lucian, mf, trist, draven, ezreal, twitch and ashe decently well. I can play jung and support well too but i usually carry from one of the other 3 roles.  msg me if you would like me to join or if you are interested in me.

Hey ill join I'm currently S2 and my mains are jungle, top and mid. I can play gnar, darius, kennen, gangplank and wukong for top. For mid I can go lux, zed, twisted fate, ahri and fizz. And for jungle I can go lee sin, kindred, vi, hecarim and amumu. I also work 5 days a week 8 hours a day so playing at night is fine for me.
